channel.title: samsung900x3a on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in samsung900x3a on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Samsung 900x3a Ultraportable Review: WOW! The Looks!
item.description: WOW! The Looks The design of the Samsung 9 series makes you scream wow. When you get it, even the box makes you say wow. It is beautiful, sleek and different, something you want to carry around because it will make others say the same and look at you in a much better way. And that is exactly what happens. Wherever I’ve pulled it out questions have arised about it and everybody wanted to hold it.

item.title: How To Install Ubuntu in a Samsung 900x3a ultraportable laptop
item.description: I’ve been running Ubuntu 11.4 Natty Narwhal for a few days already on a brand new Samsung 900x3a and I have to say that I’m quite happy with it. First of all, Ubuntu Linux is the best operating system in this galaxy. Then, the machine is great, and not only for the looks. Here’s a simplified How-To: Download Ubuntu, make sure that in the dropdown box you choose the 64bit version.
